articles.author: James Shotter
articles.title: Hamas and Islamic Jihad respond to Joe Biden's Gaza peace plan - Financial Times
articles.description: Palestinian militant groups offer ‘amendments’ to US-backed proposals with talks to continue via mediators
articles.content:
Hamas and Palestinian Islamic Jihad on Tuesday gave their response to the plan set out by US President Joe Biden this month to end the eight-month old war in Gaza. 
In a statement the two groups exp… [+3141 chars]

articles.author: Richard Speed
articles.title: Raspberry Pi stock surges after London IPO - The Register
articles.description: Priced at £2.80, but goes beyond £3.90 in conditional trading
articles.content:
Raspberry Pi's IPO took place this morning on the London Stock Exchange. Shares were initially priced at £2.80 ($3.57), but they surged to £3.90 ($4.97) during early trading.
The £2.80 ($3.57) offer… [+2776 chars]

articles.author: Jamie Carter
articles.title: Mars: 'Impossible' Discovery As Frost Found Near Equator - Forbes
articles.description: Frost has been spotted near Mars's equator for the first time, on its largest volcanoes, challenging previous beliefs about the martian climate.
articles.content: This image shows Olympus Mons, the tallest volcano not only on Mars but in the entire Solar System. ... [+] The volcano measures some 600 km across. It was obtained in the early morning (7:20am Local… [+4007 chars]
